It's me, Christopher

April 25, 2018

UX Architecture

Current: Support 6 month goal: Collaborator

Over my career I've worked closely with designers to help better understand their thought process and contribute helpful insight into their UX problems. I'd like to continue this here at Aviture and help facilitate a closer relationship between designer and developer.

Frontend Javascript (

Current: Support. 6 month goal: Collaborator.

When I started at Aviture most of my javascript experience was with libraries like jQuery. I had an understanding of some core programing concepts but I'd like to become more fluent. Use this to improve my problem solving skills and apply those to working with frontend javascript.

Frontend CSS architecture

Current: Collaborator. 6 month goal: Leader

Coming into Aviture 8 months ago I had really strong understanding of CSS. Since then I haven't done much with CSS because of Decision Logic UX guide in place. I like to start working more with CSS and implementing styleguides along with new css techniques like grids and variables. From there I'd love to be one of the leaders within Aviture for resources on building out new styleguides and collaborating with the UX team.

Prototyping

Current: Support. 6 month goal: Collaborator

I've seen big benefits of prototyping on DL but for me I still seem to pull up an editing application like sketch and work through prototypes first. I'd love to be able to jump into a project and wire out a working prototype for a new feature or stand up a new project to test out new libraries.

Accessibility

Current: Beginner. 6 month goal: Support

This is something I've had some experience with in the past when a clients site got "audited" accessibilty. I'd like to start implementing more accessibility features especially with government projects that could greatly benefit this.
